item.title: Best Dressed Stars at the 2025 MTV VMAs: Doja Cat, Sabrina Carpenter, Ariana Grande and More
item.description: Tate McRae, GloRilla, Ricky Martin and LL Cool J also were among the artists who blended high-end style with whimsy, perfect for MTV’s big night.

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Singers EJAE, Rei Ami and Audrey Nuna Present at 2025 VMAs

item.title: Mariah Carey Receives First VMA With Video Vanguard Award: “What in the Sam Hill Took You So Long?!”
item.description: The superstar singer, known for her five-octave range, was honored by Ariana Grande and delivered a medley of hits, with her “Heartbreaker” alter ego Bianca making an appearance onstage.

item.title: How to Watch 2025 MTV Video Music Awards Online Without Cable for Free

item.title: MTV VMAs: 27 of the Awards Show’s Wildest Moments of All Time
item.description: From Kanye West’s infamous stage crash to Madonna locking lips with Britney Spears and Christina Aguilera, THR looks back at the most memorable moments from the show’s three-decade history.
